Title: squashfs-tools: Multiple Vulnerabilities
Synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in squashfs-tools, the worst of which can result in an arbitrary file write.

Background.Text: Squashfs is a compressed read-only filesystem for Linux. Squashfs is intended for general read-only filesystem use, for archival use (i.e. in cases where a .tar.gz file may be used), and in constrained block device/memory systems (e.g. embedded systems) where low overhead is needed.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in squashfs-tools. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.
